author: rwhitcomb
msg: Change the "label_test.bxml" file so it illustrates inserting hard-coded newlines
as well as allowing normal wrapping.

author: rvesse
msg: Add TransformExtendCombine which is used to flatten extend and assign operations together where possible.
Note that normal algebra construction does this automatically but in some cases it is useful to have this as a separate transform that may be applied
